name: tractoreando-maintenance
description: Sistema de gestión de mantenimiento de vehículos multiempresa

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.deploy: npm run build:prod && npm run init-admin && npm run production
scripts.deploy:full: npm run install:all && npm run build:prod && npm run init-admin && npm run production
scripts.deploy:optimized: npm run build:optimized && npm run init-admin && npm run production
scripts.deploy:network-test: curl -s http://localhost/health && echo 'Local OK' || echo 'Local FAIL'
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build

author: David Hernandez
